Subject: Onitama w/ Life Sized Pieces
Description: Play a 15 to 20 minute game using people as life sized pieces on a 5x5 grid. Use your actual human piece to capture the opponent's temple, or use your disciple pawns to capture the opponent's actual human piece. Interested participants should come in teams of two people: one participant to literally stand as a piece on the game board for their team, and the other participant to make decisions for the team on their turn. There will be a clothing removal element to this game, so this event is 18+.  Speakers include:wally2069 - Track: After Dark  - Duration: 2 hours
